mapper.select: SELECT AVG(PO.o_count) product_order_avg, P.p_name p_name, PO.order_p_number order_p_number FROM Product P, ProductOrder PO WHERE P.p_number = PO.order_p_number GROUP BY PO.order_p_number ORDER BY product_order_avg DESC LIMIT 0, #{limit}

SELECT CASE WHEN age < 30 THEN '20대' WHEN age < 40 THEN '30대' WHEN age < 50 THEN '40대' WHEN age < 60 THEN '50대' WHEN age > 60 THEN '60대 이상' END AS age_group, count(*) total FROM (SELECT *, FLOOR(date_format(now(), '%Y')-substring(b_birth,1,4)) age FROM Buyer) a GROUP BY age_group;

select sum(case str_month when 01 then sum end) jan22, sum(case str_month when 02 then sum end) feb22, sum(case str_month when 03 then sum end) mar22, sum(case str_month when 04 then sum end) apr22, sum(case str_month when 05 then sum end) may22, sum(case str_month when 06 then sum end) jun22, sum(case str_month when 07 then sum end) jul22, sum(case str_month when 08 then sum end) aug22, sum(case str_month when 09 then sum end) sep22, sum(case str_month when 10 then sum end) oct22, sum(case str_month when 11 then sum end) nov22, sum(case str_month when 12 then sum end) dec22 from ( select count(*) as sum, substr(b_joindate, 6,2) as str_month, substr(b_joindate, 1,4) as str_year FROM Buyer where substr(b_joindate, 1,4) =2022 group by substr(b_joindate,6,2) ) buyer
